body:
Hey Minecrafters !!!

We're currently creating a Hall Of Fame in the Atlas Hub, and we need YOU

Currently the Hall Of Fame we have looks a bit boring, so we would like to know what the best moments are from The Omega Championship, Road To Victory, The League and Battle Of Eternity!!!

We are planning on making scenarios in the Hall Of Fame to remember these moments, so please suggest them :)

Examples:
  • Tazz Togglesneak
  • ProffesorUtonium has destroyed cave


This is a serious thread, anything below that is toxic and off topic will be deleted with possible consequences.
body_tagged:
Hey Minecrafters !!!

We're currently creating a Hall Of Fame in the Atlas Hub, and we need YOU

Currently the Hall Of Fame we have looks a bit boring, so we would like to know what the best moments are from The Omega Championship, Road To Victory, The League and Battle Of Eternity!!!

We are planning on making scenarios in the Hall Of Fame to remember these moments, so please suggest them :)

Examples:
  • Tazz Togglesneak
  • ProffesorUtonium has destroyed cave


This is a serious thread, anything below that is toxic and off topic will be deleted with possible consequences.
title: [Atlas Hub] Hall Of Fame

If anyone has the logs or screenshot (cos i cant remember the names) for this please share. If none of you know what it is its when Apollo got the final kill before the time ranout and won the game but then another player (think it was lordblox) got a kill after the game ended so the score was a tie.

-Raging

replies.body:
The Avicus League 1, the match of Jardineros Team va TheCrazyBeaners, that was basically a final cuz both teams were tied in points and it was the final match of the whole league, adding to it that the winner of that match would have win the league.
it was a Bo3 TDM that ended 2-1 for Jardineros, with like 12 points above on the last TDM map

replies.body: I REMEMBER NOW. The first tournament Apollo vs Crazy Beaners where it was the quarter finals on Boundaries and Crazy Beaners didn't have enough players and AT THE LAST MINUTE Apollo got the win for crazy beaners no showing and felipu was like "no please wait we are getting our 8th - he is having trouble connecting to MC" and then the player connects JUST AS SOON AS Apollo got the win :(. I remember that so clearly

I remember that so clearly

replies.body:
I can think of some stuff that might be worthwhile putting.

Prestiges-
First to prestige in Avicade, steven5703
First to reach prestige 5 in CTH _Jasun
First to get both 1st and 5th prestige in Nexus, Ducksfanwaterloo 
First to prestige in every game, Sunnaye 
First to reach prestige in Elimination, Rinn
First to reach 100k kills, Sunnaye

Tournaments-
McZone tournament winer (Nodus I believe?)
ToC Berzerk - MVP Loo. Leaders 99250, VenomousViper, MasterProX, Loo, Upsoar, Hete.
RFV Team Allah/PPB - MVP Deltuh. Leaders- Cyclops, lgmatias.
League idfk
BoE - MVP Loo. Leaders Cyclops, lgmatias.

reply_to.body: Eleventh prestige was a yellow sun-like shape. Twelfth, an orange sun; thirteenth, a blue snowflake; fourteenth, a green snowflake; and fifteenth prestige, a black blob that my friends and I would say looked like a sea urchin or something.
